description: This spicy jalapeno, lime & coriander popcorn is packed with far more delicious flavour than salted popcorn.
name: Jalapeno, Lime & Coriander Popcorn Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium limes, juice and zest of 1, 1 chopped into wedges for serving
60g jalapeno peppers, drained and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil to a large, deep pan on a medium high heat. Add 2-3 kernels to the pan and once they begin to pop, add the remaining kernels in a single layer to the pan.
Cover the pan with a lid and shake well to coat all the kernels with oil.
Leave on the heat until the kernels start to pop, occasionally shaking the pan to prevent burning and evenly cook the kernels. After 6-7 minutes remove from the heat.

Add the remaining oil, chilli and cumin powders, lime zest, half the lime juice, chopped coriander and jalapenos. Shake with the lid on to coat evenly. Leave to stand for 1 minute and serve warm with extra lime wedges.
